posts.post_content:
I'm interested in trading for any T216 in any condition. Below are some of the cards I have available to swap. Thanks, Andy

Available:
D304 Kelly SGC-10
E103 Pastorious
T204 Hoblitzel PSA-3
T204 McIntyre PSA-2
T204 Murray SGC-20
T204 Wagner SGC-10 (note three holes)
T213-2 Baker NY PSA-1
T213-2 Crawford Detroit PSA-1
T213-2 Griffith Washington PSA-1
T213-2 Jennings Detroit PSA-1
T213-2 Marquard NY Portrait PSA-1
T213-2 Tinker Chicago Fed Bat Off Shoulder PSA-1
T213-3 Bresnahan SGC-10
1923 Walter Mails Game J. Smith SGC-88
1953 Topps #1 Jackie Robinson SGC-30
Note that while all the T213-2 HOFers are PSA-1, they present much better than that.
last of the scans - I can provide scans of Bresnahan and Jackie on request
